content.name: Reportable
content.text: Enterprise procurement requests management and analytics. Built using React, Redux, SCSS, Bootstrap. Backend is built on node.js with express.js as primary engine. MongoDB + Mongoose is used for user and units data sotrage

content.name: Mini ini CMS
content.text: Mini CMS client built for PHP apps, relying on *.ini files as a source of text and config. React, Redux, PHP and Bootstrap was used in development

content.name: Const Return
content.text: Const Return CI Web Site. Built on React and SCSS. No other libraries were used. All animations and transitions are custom tailored for experimental purposes, using raw JS and SCSS.
